question: i  have a huge keloid scar from my csection, where i was stapled instead of stitched. i had preeclampsia, came close to shock, lost a lot of blood,swelled tremendously, air casts on my legs.. i popped a coupled of staples, post natal they said i was ok but it was medicaid. have terrible cramping during ovulation and menses, as well as ferocious hormone fluctuations. is this due to scarring internally?  how do they test ?can this affect my future plans for more children? is this common? my scar is still brite purple in spots, but healed in other places..is there surgery...whats going on with me..im not the same since this emergency procedure...i pushed for 3 hours before surgery....im going back to the dr, i just want to know what i am looking at. im scared.
title: painful menses 20 months after emergency c section
